tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (RB Apparently) (PRP we)) (VP (VBP 're) (VP (VBG having) (NP (NP (DT a) (NNP Christmas) (NN tree)) (NP (DT this) (NN year))))) (: ...)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [having/VBG nsubj>[we/PRP advmod>Apparently/RB] aux>'re/VBP dobj>[tree/NN det>a/DT compound>Christmas/NNP dep>[year/NN det>this/DT]] punct>.../:]
